title: Ticket #7689: refactor massive code duplication in file transfer
description:
The function InvokeFileTransferPlugin() has been more or less duplicated (with some new functionaly) in two new functions, DetermineFileTransferPlugin() and InvokeMultipleFileTransferPlugin()

There is massive duplication of code between the two. If the old one is dead and deprecated, so be it and let's yank it out. Otherwise these should be refactored so common code is shared to prevent fixing something in one spot and not the other.
creator: zmiller
